description: PPT Skill 2.06: Format Text with WordArt
name: PPT Skill 2.06

balooActions.text: With Slide 5 displayed, select the text Aspen Falls City Hall - A great place to work. Click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click the second option in the second row - Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection.
Click the Home tab.
On the Home tab, in the Font Group, click the Font Size arrow and then click 44.

actions.balooActionText: With Slide 5 displayed, select the text Aspen Falls City Hall - A great place to work. Click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

actions.balooActionText: In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click the second option in the second row - Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

values.actVal: Ribbon__WordArt Styles__Gradient Fill - Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection

actions.balooActionText: Click the Home tab.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

balooActions.text: Click and drag to select the text in the placeholder. Click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row).
Right-click and on the Mini toolbar, click the Font Size arrow and click 44 (or click in the Font Size box, type 44, then press ENTER).

actions.balooActionText: Click and drag to select the text in the placeholder. Click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

actions.balooActionText: In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row).
actions.name: clickAndWait()

values.actVal: Ribbon__WordArt Styles__Gradient Fill - Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection

balooActions.text: Select the content placeholder on Slide 5 and click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row).
On the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Font Dialog Box Launcher.
In the Font dialog box, use the Size spin arrows to display 44. Alternatively, click in the Size box to select the existing contents and type 44.
Click OK.

balooActions.text: Select the content placeholder on Slide 5 and click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row).
On the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Increase Font Size button until 44 is selected. Alternatively, click in the Font Size box, type 44, then press ENTER.

actions.balooActionText: In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row).

actions.balooActionText: On the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Increase Font Size button until 44 is selected. Alternatively, click in the Font Size box, type 44, then press ENTER.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

balooActions.text: Press TAB to select the content placeholder on Slide 5. Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, Q, then TAB or ARROW to select Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row) and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
Press CTRL+SHIFT+F (or CTRL+SHIFT+P or CTRL+T). Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, FN.
In the Font dialog box, press ALT+S (or S or TAB) to select Size box, type 44 (or use ARROW keys to display 44).
Press ENTER (or TAB to select OK and press ENTER or SPACEBAR).

actions.balooActionText: Press TAB to select the content placeholder on Slide 5. Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, Q, then TAB or ARROW to select Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column, second row) and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.

actions.balooActionText: Press CTRL+SHIFT+F (or CTRL+SHIFT+P or CTRL+T). Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, FN.

actions.balooActionText: Press ENTER (or TAB to select OK and press ENTER or SPACEBAR).

balooActions.text: Select the text in the content placeholder on Slide 5.
Press ALT (or F10, or F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, FS, type 44 (or press DOWN ARROW to select 44), then press ENTER.

Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, Q, then TAB or ARROW to select Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection (second column second row) and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.

balooActions.text: Select the text in the content placeholder on Slide 5 and on the Mini toolbar, click the Font Size arrow and click 44 (or click the Increase Font Size button until 44 is selected).
Click the Drawing Tools Format tab. In the WordArt Styles group, click the More button. Click the second option in the second row - Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection.

items.text: With Slide 5 displayed, select the text Aspen Falls City Hall - A great place to work. Apply the Gradient Fill – Dark Green, Accent 1, Reflection WordArt style (second column, second row in the More WordArt Styles list). Increase the Font Size to 44.

balooActions.text: With the text still selected, click the Drawing Tools Format tab.
In the WordArt Styles group, click the Text Fill button and then click the second color in the first row - Black, Text 1.

actions.balooActionText: In the WordArt Styles group, click the Text Fill button and then click the second color in the first row - Black, Text 1.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

balooActions.text: Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, TI, TAB or ARROW to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row). Press ENTER or SPACEBAR. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 two times), H, FC, TAB or ARROW to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row), then press ENTER or SPACEBAR. Alternatively, on the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Font Color arrow and click Black, Text 1 (second column, first row).

actions.balooActionText: Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, TI, TAB or ARROW to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row). Press ENTER or SPACEBAR. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 two times), H, FC, TAB or ARROW to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row), then press ENTER or SPACEBAR. Alternatively, on the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Font Color arrow and click Black, Text 1 (second column, first row).
actions.name: pressKey()

balooActions.text: Right-click the placeholder or select the text. On the Mini toolbar, click the Font Color arrow and click Black, Text 1 (second column, first row).

With the text or the placeholder selected, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, SZ. Alternatively, press SHIFT+F10, O. Or, press ALT (or F10, or F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, O. Or, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, SO, W or S, L. Or, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, SF, G (or T), M. Alternatively, with the placeholder selected, press SHIFT+F10, Z.
Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Options and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Fill & Outline, if necessary.
Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Fill and press ENTER or SPACEBAR (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the Solid Fill option. Alternatively, press S (or SHIFT+S) to select Solid Fill.
Press C (or SHIFT+C or TAB to select the Color button and press ENTER or SPACEBAR). Press TAB or ARROW keys to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row). Press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
Press CTRL+SPACEBAR, C (or TAB or ARROW to select Close and press ENTER).

actions.balooActionText: With the text or the placeholder selected, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, SZ. Alternatively, press SHIFT+F10, O. Or, press ALT (or F10, or F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, O. Or, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, SO, W or S, L. Or, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), JD, SF, G (or T), M. Alternatively, with the placeholder selected, press SHIFT+F10, Z.
actions.name: pressKey()

actions.balooActionText: Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Options and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
actions.name: pressKey()

actions.balooActionText: Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Fill and press ENTER or SPACEBAR (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the Solid Fill option. Alternatively, press S (or SHIFT+S) to select Solid Fill.
actions.name: pressKey()

actions.balooActionText: Press C (or SHIFT+C or TAB to select the Color button and press ENTER or SPACEBAR). Press TAB or ARROW keys to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row). Press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
actions.name: pressKey()

balooActions.text: On the Home tab, in the Drawing group (or on the Drawing Tools Format tab, in the Shape Styles group), click Shape Effects, point to Preset (or Bevel), click 3-D Options (or point to Shadow, click Shadow Options; or point to Reflection, click Reflection Options; or point to Glow, click Glow Options; or point to Soft Edges, click Soft Edges Options; or point to 3-D Rotation, click 3-D Rotation Options). Or, right-click the placeholder and click Size and Position (or Format Shape).
In the Format Background pane, click Text Options. Click the Text Fill & Outline icon, if necessary.
Click Text Fill (if necessary), Click the Solid fill option to select it.
Click the Color button and click Black, Text 1 (second column, first row).
Click the task pane's Close button. Alternatively, click the Task Pane Options button and click Close.

Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, O. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, SF, G or T, M. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H (or JD), SO, W or S, L. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H or JD, SE, P (or B), O (or H (or JD), SE, S (or E), S; or H (or JD), SE, R, R; or H (or JD), SE, G, G; or H (or JD), SE, D, R).
Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Options and press ENTER or SPACEBAR (if necessary).
If necessary, press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select the icons under Text Options. If necessary, press ARROW keys to select Text Fill & Outline.
Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Fill and press ENTER or SPACEBAR (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the Solid Fill option. Alternatively, press S (or SHIFT+S) to select Solid Fill.
Press C (or SHIFT+C or TAB to select the Color button and press ENTER or SPACEBAR). Press TAB or ARROW keys to select Black, Text 1 (second column, first row). Press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
Press CTRL+SPACEBAR, C (or TAB or ARROW to select Close and press ENTER).

actions.balooActionText: Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, O. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, SF, G or T, M. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H (or JD), SO, W or S, L. Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H or JD, SE, P (or B), O (or H (or JD), SE, S (or E), S; or H (or JD), SE, R, R; or H (or JD), SE, G, G; or H (or JD), SE, D, R).
actions.name: pressKey()

actions.balooActionText: Press TAB (or SHIFT+TAB) to select Text Fill and press ENTER or SPACEBAR (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the Solid Fill option. Alternatively, press S (or SHIFT+S) to select Solid Fill.
actions.name: pressKey()

balooActions.text: Right-click the placeholder and click Size and Position. Alternatively, right-click the placeholder and on the Mini toolbar, click Fill, point to Gradient, then click More Gradients (or point to Texture and click More Textures). Alternatively, right-click the placeholder, click Fill, type G (or T), M (or TAB or ARROW to select Gradient or Texture, press ENTER or SPACEBAR or RIGHT ARROW, then TAB or ARROW to select More Gradients or More Textures and press ENTER or SPACEBAR).
In the Format Background pane, click Text Options.
Click Text Fill (if necessary), Click the Solid fill option to select it.
Click the Color button and click Black, Text 1 (second column, first row).
Click the task pane's Close button. Alternatively, click the Task Pane Options button and click Close.

actions.name: clickAtPercent()
actions.syntax: clickAtPercent(String elementName, int xposPercent, int yposPercent)

items.text: On Slide 5, with the text still selected, change the Text Fill to Black, Text 1 (second column, first row).

balooActions.text: Click the Slide 6 thumbnail. On the Home tab, in the Slides group, click the New Slide arrow, and then under Retrospect, click Blank.
Click the Insert tab.
In the Text group, click the WordArt button and then click Fill - White, Outline - Accent 2, Hard Shadow - Accent 2 style (fourth column, third row).
Type Have a great day!.
Select the text you have just typed and then, on the Mini toolbar, click the Font Size arrow and click 96.

On the Insert tab, in the Text group, click the WordArt button and click Fill - White, Outline - Accent 2, Hard Shadow - Accent 2 style (fourth column, third row).

balooActions.text: Click the Slide 6 thumbnail. On the Home tab, in the Slides group, click the New Slide arrow and then, under Retrospect, click Blank.
Click the Insert tab. In the Text group, click the WordArt button and click Fill - White, Outline - Accent 2, Hard Shadow - Accent 2 style (fourth column, third row).
Type Have a great day!

Select the text and on the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Increase Font Size button until 96 is selected. Alternatively, click in the Font Size box, type 96, then press ENTER. Alternatively, on the Home tab, in the Font group, click the Font Dialog Box Launcher. In the Font dialog box, click the Size up spin arrow until 96 displays (or select the current size, optionally press DELETE or BACKSPACE or CTRL+X, type 96, then press ENTER (or TAB to select OK and press ENTER or SPACEBAR).

actions.name: enterText()

balooActions.text: Press ESC to deselect the text. Press DOWN ARROW (or PAGE DOWN or RIGHT ARROW or END or CTRL+END) to display Slide 6. Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, I, then TAB or ARROW to select Blank (under Retrospect) and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.

Press ALT (or F10, or press F6 until the ribbon is selected), N, W, then TAB or ARROW to select Fill - White, Outline - Accent 2, Hard Shadow - Accent 2 style (fourth column, third row) and press ENTER or SPACEBAR.
Optionally press DELETE or BACKSPACE. Type Have a great day!.
Select the text or the placeholder and press CTRL+SHIFT+F (or CTRL+SHIFT+P or CTRL+T). Alternatively, press ALT (or F10, or F6 until the ribbon is selected), H, FN (or 6, M).
In the Font dialog box, click the Font tab, if necessary. Press ALT+S (or S or TAB) to select Size box, type 96 (or press UP ARROW to select 96).
Press ENTER (or TAB to select OK, and then press ENTER).

items.text: Insert a new slide after Slide 6 with a Blank layout (Retrospect theme). Insert WordArt with the text Have a great day! and the Fill - White, Outline - Accent 2, Hard Shadow - Accent 2 style (fourth column, third row). Increase the font size of the WordArt to 96.
